title: Explainer: India's trade with Turkey and Azerbaijan, Pakistan's backers during Operation Sindoor
description: India's trade relations with Turkey and Azerbaijan are expected to come under strain due to Ankara and Baku backing Islamabad and condemning India's recent strikes on terror camps in Pakistan. Turkey and Azerbaijan have criticised India's strike on terror infrastructures in Pakistan and Pakistan-occ...

title: Backlash over backing Pakistan: Turkey and Azerbaijan face full trade boycott from Indian traders
description: In a striking display of economic nationalism, more than 125 top trade leaders from across India declared a complete boycott of all commercial, travel and cultural engagement with Turkey and Azerbaijan. The decision, driven by a unanimous resolution at a national conference of traders in New Delhi o...
